name: Reddot in the World Of Qby
name_original: Reddot in the World Of Qby
description:
This is the alpha version for Reddot The Game. I will update it frequently and maybe release the full game after all. It's my first coded game and I really want you guys to critizize me if I'm doing things wrong. If you have ideas, let me know in the comments!

-download-

download the three files and place them in one map. Then just click 'king sting' and your done!
